content.text:
# Draft:Kusaug Traditional Area

The Kusaug traditional area comprises of six administrative districts in the upper east region of Ghana with an estimated population of about 723,000 with Bawku as its capital. The kusaug traditional area is ruled by a magnificent overlord, the Bawku Naba Zug-raan Asigri Abugrago Azoka II, a gazzeted member of the Ghana National House of Chiefs.
